import React, { Fragment, useState } from "react"; import PropTypes from "prop-types"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { addExperience } from "../../actions/profile"; import { Link, withRouter } from "react-router-dom"; const AddExperience = (props) => { return (

Add An Experience

Add any developer/programming positions that you have had in the past

* = required field

From Date

Current Job

To Date

Go Back
); }; AddExperience.propTypes = { addExperience: PropTypes.func.isRequired, }; export default connect(null, { addExperience })(withRouter(AddExperience));
